author: Video Advice
description:
Go to https://surfshark.com/advice or use code ADVICE at checkout to get 4 extra months of Surfshark VPN!

A renowned neuroscientist finally opens up about a tiny, overlooked brain region that may hold the key to how we feel, decide, and even sense beyond the physical. From historical clues to a startling surgery case, we explore why this “hidden switch” has researchers—and tech developers—watching closely.

We’ve included an excerpt from Dr. Christof Koch's research—thank you for providing the insights that helped bring depth and clarity to this video.
Koch’s latest book: https://www.amazon.nl/-/en/Christof-Koch/dp/1541602803

References & Clips
Christof Koch: Claustrum: The Seat of Consciousness? - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dVdRQyVOLNk
Francis Crick: Scientific Search for the Soul (excerpt) -- Thinking Allowed DVD w/ Jeffrey Mishlove - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qzs2aAcfOTQ
Lisa Miller, PhD On The Neuroscience Of Spirituality | Rich Roll Podcast - https://www.youtube.com/
title: The Most Famous Neuroscientist Breaks Silence on the Claustrum
